channel.description: Hugo Demo Syllabus CC 515 - Full Stack Web Development Syllabus Boilerplate here Learning Outcomes Learn Something New Academic Honesty Custom Policies This is a custom version of the Academic Honesty syllabus policy Kansas State University has an Honor and Integrity System based on personal integrity, which is presumed to be sufficient assurance that, in academic matters, oneâ€™s work is performed honestly and without unauthorized assistance. Undergraduate and graduate students, by registration, acknowledge the jurisdiction of the Honor and Integrity System.
